reviews.text: Stayed here a few years back when I went to run with the bulls. Went
reviews.title: Sufficient, but not what I'd call nice.

likes.liked: — That it was in Pamplona and easily accessible to the San Fermin Festival
likes.disliked: — An all-around forgettable hotel...Nothing special at all.

reviews.text: with a college buddy, and it was sufficient for us...Nothing special at all, but a place to put our heads! It was one of just a few hotels
reviews.title: Nice but overpriced

reviews.text: that still had rooms 6 months before Festival de San Fermin, so booked a room there out of necessity.
reviews.title: Stay away

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of this hotel is fine and was easy to find on our Gps. However, the location is on a busy road which causes a great deal of traffic noise. The hotel has double insulated windows, that when closed shut out the noise, but the room air conditioning could not keep the room cool enough for comfortable sleeping. The bed was also very hard, thus our nights sleep was poor. The hotel staff were helpful but no one was at all friendly. Breakfast was fine and were we able to find a good parking spot on the street adjacent to the hotel. The area is unremarkable except that there is a large university nearby and since it was a Friday night there was much drinking in the nearby beer bars. All in all it's not a bad hotel, but for the price I think I could have done better and gotten a better nights sleep.
reviews.title: Only So So

reviews.text: This is a pleasant well furnished hotel in a good location. Not to near the Old Town to be noisy, but within a pleasant walking distance. Plenty buses right outside for those who don't want to walk. The staff were all very helpful to non- Spanish speakers like me. The cafeteria was excellent, and the quality of the restaurant food high. We ate from both the set menu, which was excellent value but far too much food, and the a la carte menu and were very satisfied on both occasions. A minor gripe was the number of times a day the password for the Internet changed, but as wifi was free throughout the hotel and the password readily available, this is just nit-picking!
reviews.title: A Comfortable Stay.

reviews.text: hotel is modern clean and quiet . has a hotel restaurant cafeteria which is good . American breakfast buffet is 15 Euros . Parking your car overnight is 20 Euros . If you rent a car use eurocar as the use the hotel garage and you do not pay parking .This Hotel is very close to the UNAV and the UNAV hospital . I would say food is good anywhere in the city of course some better than others . I gave it a 3 star because its the room and restaurant and parking ......Location is key for me , this was our first trip .. Hotel room for three was 96 Euros per night. Everyone was nice ,but it was overpriced for two twin beds and a roll away !This seems to be common.We did not check out any other hotel rooms and just stayed 9 nights because of convenience .Pamplona is a clean modern civilized city . We were very impresed .
reviews.title: clean and quiet

reviews.text: I have to spend a total of 4 weeks there every year for work- it´s nearby everything- university, hospitals and even the town centre (a 15 min. walk or 3 min. busride). It has a great staff who take their work with guests, especially those being treated at the nearby hospitals and clinics, very seriously, really at a human level. The menu of the day at the restaurant Doña Blanca is varied and gourmet quality- true value for money- and Juan the maître d' is always knowledgable and helpful, not just about food , but anything relating to Navarra, etc. Rooms and facilities are normal,"business nice" I might say. Again, the staff are what make this hotel more like a home for me- whether at breakfast, the bar/café, at the reception, even the cleaning staff...Highly recommended also as a base if you'll be travelling around the region.
reviews.title: A hotel more like a home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for just the one night on our way south, the hotel is clean and the staff helpful.
reviews.title: Good Stopover

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed one night here on our trip through Spain and France with our dog. As with many hotels pets were not allowed but the underground car park was perfect. Our dog loves the car and is quite use to staying overnight whenever we travel. It was very cold in Pamplona but the car was well protected.
reviews.title: Good location-secure parking

reviews.text: The hotel is in a good location just a short stroll from the centre, and the rooms were spacious and clean. Would stay here again with or without the dog
reviews.title: Happy to get a room during bull run festival
Great place to stay during St. Fermin
reviews.text: I am giving this hotel a slightly more positive review than it deserves, because they still had a room for me on Friday evening during the San Fermin festival, without holding a reservation. Apparently, the Spanish king stays in this hotel when he visits the nearby clinic.

reviews.title: Hotel Blanca de Navarra
reviews.text: Only a mile from the old town & bus stop right out front.

Stayed here 3 nights during the san fermin festival. $200/nt double. It's on a main street through town be we still managed to get lost more times than you'd think. We parked the rental car when we arrived and never moved it - parking on the street was free and seemed safe enough in this part of town. It was about a 20 minute walk from the party district and about 25-30 minutes from Santo Domingo each morning. Very clean, internet access for 2 euro/30 minutes. Did not include breakfast and the restaurant was not even open at 6:30 when leaving the hotel each morning. They also did not understand the importance of coffee, none in the room or in the lobby. Very quiet, comfortable room and one block from A-15 made for an easy departure the morning we had to head back to MAD. Not a ton of restaurants in the area but there were a couple of little markets. We went without reservations and compared to the other places we stopped to look at was the nicest looking/best price.
reviews.title: Nice hotel

reviews.text: I have stayed at this hotel regularly since September 2007, but have never reviewed it until now. The hotel is very well located, with less than a 5 minute walk to the Clinica Universata Hospital. It has casual and formal restaurants on the ground floor, was well as a car rental outlet accessible from the lobby. The front desk staff are friendly and can speak English. The hotel is clean and well maintained, with very good, quiet rooms. It has some items that are not found in this class of hotel normally, such as a bidet and a telephone in the bathroom. It lacks some things I have come to expect in a North American hotel, such as an alarm clock and Kleenex. It has the Spanish version of a convenience store within a block, as well as a pharmacy, fast food outlets and other restaurants within a 10 minute walk. It is close to a main highway and about a 10 minute cab ride from the airport. Public transit is right outside the front door. Overall, I would strongly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Pamplona, particularly for North Americans who do not speak Spanish.
reviews.title: EXCELLENT TOURIST GRADE HOTEL FOR PAMPLONA

reviews.text: Hotel Blanca de Navarra is modern, clean and comfortable. My room and bathroom were large enough, room-service made a cleaness everyday at the right time (when I was absent). Breakfast was ok, staff on reception was helpful and speak English. WIFI internet is free and stable, I only should take another pass when 24 hours online was reached.
reviews.title: Good place to stay

reviews.text: 1) hotel is quite far away from the center;
reviews.title: A clean and convenient place with a great pintxos bar!

reviews.text: 2) I was there on sport event and restaraunt served dinner for us very late in my view (at 22:15). Also, all sportsmen should eat at the same time and service was quite slow. But maybe if you are individual guest you will not be affected by this problems.
reviews.title: nice hotel, great city to explore.
